article_title: Mother wounded at vigil for son prays for an end to violence
article_text: Will Sherard, one of Milwaukee’s most notorious landlords, has routinely paid the minimum on fines for hundreds of building code violations, even as he buys new properties. That game may be ending.

article_metadata.title: Photos: Mother wounded at vigil for son prays for an end to violence

og.description: Kendrai Walker's mother and her family's north side neighbors hope to come together to make their community a safer place to life.
og.title: Photos: Mother wounded at vigil for son prays for an end to violence

article_summary:
Will Sherard, one of Milwaukee’s most notorious landlords, has routinely paid the minimum on fines for hundreds of building code violations, even as he buys new properties.
That game may be ending.
